name: The Tipsy Pixie
description:
Welcome to your new job at The Tipsy Pixie!  

Dreenie, a coffee-dragon-genie, showed up in your morning joe and transported you to a world full of fantasy creatures.  Now, you've got to earn your keep by pouring drinks at the premiere magic-beverage tavern, the Tipsy Pixie.  

  • Take orders and mix mystical drinks by combining five different ingredients!  Consult the recipe book to learn all sorts of magic cocktails.  The better your drinks, the more tips you earn!
  • Get to know a cast of interesting characters over 6 days of chill bartending!  You'll meet all sorts of creatures, from a satyr with romantic troubles to a hydra with a hyperactive roommate.  They'll  be more interested in chit-chat if your drinks are tastier!
  • Revisit your favorite characters during the holidays with our 2-day, festive themed free DLC!  
  • Test your bartending skills in the no-frills Happy Hour mode!  Last as long as you can serving customers until time runs out.  Every good drink grants you more time!
Your shift starts now!  Download on Android for free! The Original Tappers:
